about_the_game:
This Is New Earth Saga Of the New Gods.


Life is good, the main character, Blake, is surrounded by beautiful women...



Good Friends...



And Adoring Fans.



But with a simple series of choices, fortunate or unfortunate, everything changes.
Magic enters the world once more, and begins to shape reality in ways both expected, and unexpected.
What will you make of this New Earth? Will you resist the forces of change? Or embrace them? Will you become a monster? Or will you become one of the New Gods!



Blake "The Hammer" Ingersol, is a college baseball prodigy, and avid tabletop gamer.



He's dating Chelsea, a beautiful woman who always finds new ways to add adventure to his life.



One evening, as they and their friends are concluding a game, Michelle, proposes to Adam. She gives him a simple antique ring that, unbeknownst to either of them, is the mythical ring of wishes. When he makes a casual wish... it changes everything, for everyone, and possibly... ends the world.

At Present

This Game Contains Close to 2500 Images
More Than 60 Animations, both sexual and Non
Over 100 Different Music/Audio Effects
3 Entirely Unique Endings (More to come)
The option of changing over to a female MC for future DLC's
Hours of content
and thousands of lines of dialogue.

With Much More to Come...

The narrative path of this game is a fairly faithful, though not entirely faithful, translation of the Book Series by Daniel Black, Saga of the New Gods, set in the universe of New Earth. While the other paths, corruption, investigative, or Harem, tell an entirely new story, showing how things may have changed, if a slightly different choice was made.

This game is a choice driven Adult Visual Novel where your choices not only shape what happens to you, but what happens to the world around you, the people in it, and your own body and future within the game, as well as all future sequels and DLC.



This game was developed for you by a husband-and-wife team of game dev's, and we hope you enjoy it.

Gameplay

The game is built on choices that will have an impact on the narrative. Multiple love interests, monstrous, mythological, and human, are available to be pursued, each with their own backstory.

The game contains explicit sexual content including (but not limited to) vanilla, lesbian, corruption, voyeurism, masturbation, group sex, BDSM, pregnancy (in later DLC), creampies, facials, bukkake, and more.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content of a sexual nature, as well as graphic nudity.

detailed_description:
Mature Content Disclaimer

The developers describe the content like this:

This game is intended for adults only and includes explicit, sexual content and frequent violence that some viewers may find offensive. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. All characters are depicted as 18 and over.

Contains blood, gore, violence, nudity, graphic depictions of oral, vaginal, anal, and non-penetrative sexual acts, (references to) sexual assault and non-consensual sex.

short_description: Blake "The Hammer" Ingersol, is an avid gamer. He's dating Chelsea, who always finds new ways to rock his world. As they are concluding a game, Michelle, gives a ring of wishes to the man she loves, who makes a wish... that will change everything, for everyone, and possibly... end the world.
